verses.verse: How hast thou helped <S%H5826><s%> him that is without power <S%H3581><s%>? how savest <S%H3467><s%> thou the arm <S%H2220><s%> that hath no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%>?
How hast thou counselled <S%H3289><s%> him that hath no <S%H3808><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>? and how hast thou plentifully <S%H7230><s%> declared <S%H3045><s%> the thing as it is <S%H8454><s%>?
To whom hast thou uttered <S%H5046><s%> words <S%H4405><s%>? and whose spirit <S%H5397><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> from thee?
Dead <S%H7496><s%> things are formed <S%H2342><s%> from under the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H7931><s%> thereof.
Hell <S%H7585><s%> is naked <S%H6174><s%> before him, and destruction <S%H11><s%> hath no covering <S%H3682><s%>.
He stretcheth out <S%H5186><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> over the empty place <S%H8414><s%>, and hangeth <S%H8518><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> upon nothing <S%H1099><s%>.
He bindeth up <S%H6887><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in his thick clouds <S%H5645><s%>; and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> is not rent <S%H1234><s%> under them.
He holdeth back <S%H270><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of his throne <S%H3678><s%>, and spreadeth <S%H6576><s%> his cloud <S%H6051><s%> upon it.
He hath compassed <S%H2328><s%> the waters <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4325><s%> with bounds <S%H2706><s%>, until the day <S%H216><s%> and night <S%H2822><s%> come to an end <S%H8503><s%>.
The pillars <S%H5982><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> tremble <S%H7322><s%> and are astonished <S%H8539><s%> at his reproof <S%H1606><s%>.
He divideth <S%H7280><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> with his power <S%H3581><s%>, and by his understanding <S%H8394><s%> <S%H8394><s%> he smiteth <S%H4272><s%> through the proud <S%H7293><s%>.
By his spirit <S%H7307><s%> he hath garnished <S%H8235><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; his hand <S%H3027><s%> hath formed <S%H2342><s%> the crooked <S%H1281><s%> serpent <S%H5175><s%>.

Lo, these are parts <S%H7098><s%> of his ways <S%H1870><s%>: but how little <S%H8102><s%> a portion <S%H1697><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> of him? but the thunder <S%H7482><s%> of his power <S%H1369><s%> who can understand <S%H995><s%>?
